name: @charlesstover/charlesstover.com
author: Charles Stover <charlesstover.com@charlesstover.com>
description: the professional portfolio of Charles Stover

scripts.prepublish: yarn run eslint && yarn run test && yarn workspaces foreach --interlaced --parallel --topological-dev --verbose run prepublish
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others --kill-others-on-fail --names charlesstover.com,cloudflare-analytics "yarn packages/charlesstover.com run start" "yarn packages/cloudflare-analytics-worker run start"
scripts.up: yarn up "@*/*" "!(aws-rum-react|react-datadog|unknown2string|use-offline)" && yarn up --recursive "@*/*" "*" && yarn sdks vscode
